actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1124(c) of title 10, United States Code, to remove the restriction that a member of the Armed Forces must be on active duty to be eligible for the payment of a cash award for a suggestion, invention, or scientific achievement.

summary.text: Makes cash awards for suggestions, inventions, or scientific achievements available to individuals who made such suggestion or achieved such accomplishment while in an active reserve status of the armed forces, notwithstanding such individual's death, retirement, or separation from service. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 3925)
